body:
Hi all, I am wondering what is the default setup for mechanical ventilation when using the Ideal Loads Air System in HB (how is the outdoor air flow rate calculated?). The .idf  contains the following: **DesignSpecification:OutdoorAir,**
**    zone_1OutdoorAirCntrl,                    !- Name**
**    Sum,        !- Outdoor Air Method**
**    0.0,          !- Outdoor Air Flow per Person {m3/s-person}**
**    0.0,          !- Outdoor Air Flow per Zone Floor Area {m3/s-m2}**
**    , !- Outdoor Air Flow per Zone {m3/s}**
**    , !- Outdoor Air Flow Air Changes per Hour {1/hr}**
**    ; !- Outdoor Air Flow Rate Fraction Schedule Name** Which made me think there was no outdoor air flow. But I guess I am wrong ! Thanks a lot for your help, Marc
topic: Ideal Loads Air System default mechanical ventilation setting
